name: The Smurfs
overview: Play and replay a fantastic collection of games for endless hours of fun. Collect resources and progress through an extraordinary and original story to help the Smurfs rebuild their village. Add personal touches to make it your own unique Smurf village! -Meet the Smurfs from the original comics -Be part of an exciting new story -Fun minigames tailored for the 3DS -Build your own Smurfs village
